mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.articleno AS "articleno", a.division AS "division", a.brandname AS "brandname", a.uksize AS "uksize", a.size AS "size", a.innernum AS "innernum", a.sex AS "sex", a.marketprice AS "marketprice", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.price AS "price", a.quarter AS "quarter", a.discount AS "discount", a.warehousename AS "warehousename"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO a_stock( id, articleno, division, brandname, uksize, size, innernum, sex, marketprice, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, price, quarter, discount, warehousename ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{articleno}, #{division}, #{brandname}, #{uksize}, #{size}, #{innernum}, #{sex}, #{marketprice}, 1, #{createDate}, 1, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{price}, #{quarter}, #{discount}, #{warehousename} )
mapper.update: UPDATE a_stock SET articleno = #{articleno}, division = #{division}, brandname = #{brandname}, uksize = #{uksize}, size = #{size}, innernum = #{innernum}, sex = #{sex}, marketprice = #{marketprice}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, price = #{price}, quarter = #{quarter}, discount = #{discount}, warehousename = #{warehousename} WHERE id = #{id}
